adHeader: Clean. Really Clean! Peninsula Cleaning Expert by Hire a Cleaning
adDetails: Clean. Really clean! Give yourself the time to do the things you enjoy. Think of what you can do with the time you would otherwise spend cleaning your Affordable, Quality Cleaning -- at your convenience. Call today for a one time only, to a regular Weekly, Bi-Weekly or Monthly service. House cleaning services by Hire a Cleaning offer the highest quality and most trusted name in professional house cleaning and maid services in the San Francisco/Marin/Peninsula Bay Area. Our expertly trained, uniformed maids will clean your home with the utmost professionalism and highest quality cleaning methods, surpassing your expectations every time we clean your home! No matter what your needs are, we are equipped and ready to handle all of your cleaning needs, whether it's windows, carpets, area rugs, dry cleaning, laundry, tile and grout steam cleaning, or any other type of cleaning, you can rest easy knowing that Hire a Cleaning can handle them all! HIRE A CLEANING QUALITY SERVICES INCLUDE: Floors vacuumed and washed. Dust and polish all furniture. Vacuum all carpets. Wash sinks and fixtures. Window sills and frames damp wiped. Clean all counter tops. Clean and sanitize showers / toilets. Clean all counter top appliances. Door frames dusted and wiped. Spot cleaning for fingertips and smudges. Professional cleaning throughout your home!
